Articles.Content: I'm looking for some truly massive cargo bays, in 3.75m and 5m. Does anyone know of any?

Why not just rescale one ?

EDIT- Cargo Transportation Solutions http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/129771
I should probably install tweakscale for once
You don't have to use tweakscale to scale parts you can but don't have too you can just edit the cfg file.
